amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Health and Human Services, in conjunction with the Secretary of Education, to conduct a review of Federal early learning and care programs and make recommendations for streamlining the various programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 2812 proposed by Senator Enzi.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2812 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 72.
